name: No Churn Strawberry Cheesecake Ice Cream
description: Make this creamy, smooth, delicious no churn strawberry cheesecake ice cream in MINUTES! You'll never need an ice cream maker again!
ingredients: 2 cup fresh strawberries de-stemmed and washed (can substitute 1 cup frozen)
2 cups heavy whipping cream very cold
14 ounces sweetened condensed milk one can
8 ounces cream cheese bring to room temperature to soften
instructions: Using a food processor, purée strawberries. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl or mixer, beat heavy cream, gradually increasing speed until stiff peaks form. Add sweetened condensed milk, softened cream cheese and strawberries. Blend until smooth. Fold in crushed graham crackers. Pour into a loaf pan or airtight container. Freeze 2+ hours until solid. Serve with crushed graham crackers.
